item.title: Stoffel's grandmother
item.summary: The narrator’s grandmother restored to life. Related by /a!kúnta. (L I.-2. 133) |a!kunta's (Stoffel's) grandmother (his 'oud mamma') is dead. The people come back to look (to 'smell') for her but she has gone away. She has stood up and walked away. The people set her things down and sleep in the darkness, and get up the next day.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book I-2
